name: Mission Impawsible (Spottedphyre, Grinjr, ntd-fx1)
description:
Made for My First Game Jam: Winter 2020

Spottedphyre (Itch.o, Youtube, DeviantART)- Team Lead, Producer, Lead Modeler

Grinjr (Itch.io) - Technical Lead, Programmer

CherriTans (Twitter)- Concept Artist, Texture Artist

ntd-fx1 (Itch.io, Youtube) - UI Designer, Programmer

Hellion - Modeler, Initial Concept

Kay2036 (Youtube) - Guest Art

Play as a mischievous floppy ferret who has a knack for taking things that catch his eye!
